review.reviewBody: The dishes are all fresh and I am very satisfied with the portion. 2nd time ordering from them. The pork ribs in black bean was the highlight. TY.
great portion and was delicious definitely would order from again!!
We like their food and service. Is our Chinese go to option.

Cutting corners by putting more sauce, vegetables and little to no protein. Not worth the value of ordering here. Looks like struggling due to current economic times.  Last time ordering at the place.
everything is amazing as always its just that we didnt get the singaporean style vermicilli we got fried rice instead
